DOC.brief_summary: The main goal of this study is to determine the association between: - the quantity of mother's milk and duration of breastfeeding - the intake of polyunsaturated fatty acids and iron during hospitalization and the development of preterm infants born with a GA < 32 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Early Nutrition and Neurological Development of Very Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: infants with a gestational age < 32 weeks already included in the EPIPAGE2 study agreement of parents Exclusion criteria: death during hospitalisation
